name: JUMP (comma) FIRE!
description:
This game is an entry for the 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Two Button Jam

JUMP (comma) FIRE! is a cross between Flappy Bird and an Arcade Shooter game.

How to Play: Press 'J' to jump and 'F' to fire. Don't jump too high to fall too low or you'll take damage.  And don't let the enemies pass or touch you or you'll take damage. When you 0 Life (the yellow number) it's game over. 

I hope you'll find my game fun. -Mike S.
